Parcellation from the Human Connectome Project

Source: R/glasser.R
glasser_3d.Rd

Parcellation from the Human Connectome Project

glasser_3d

Format

A data.frame with 2483 observations and 8 variables

long

coordinates for the x-axis

lat

coordinates for the y-axis

area

name of region

hemi

dummy name of the hemisphere

side

which side to view (medial, lateral)

label

label name from Freesurfer

atlas

name of the atlas

References

Glasser et al. (2016) Nature, volume 536, pages 171–178 (PubMed)

Examples

data(glasser_3d)

  • Format
  • References
